The Final Coil of Bahamut is comprised of multiple dungeons, or \x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff{\x1a\x03turns\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03. Please be warned that the spell Return cannot be used in certain turns.
Progress within the Final Coil of Bahamut is saved at specific locations for each player, and you may resume your foray where you left off.

To enter the Final Coil of Bahamut, you must be in a party of eight Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 50 or higher.
All members must also have completed the quest \xe2\x80\x9cFragments of Truth.\xe2\x80\x9d
The starting point is determined by the party leader's progress.
Even party members whose progress is different may participate, provided they meet the entry requirements.
Those who have not advanced as far as the party leader will have their progress updated to be the same as that of the leader.
Those who have advanced further than the party leader, on the other hand, will retain their progress.
In this latter case, you will not receive rewards from dungeons that you have already completed, and the number of coffers that pop will be adjusted accordingly.
All forays into the Final Coil of Bahamut are limited to 90 minutes (Earth time).
All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area.
Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
